--- title: Instance keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Class representing a single instance (record)." description: "Class representing a single instance (record)." nb_path: "src\instance.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Instance consists of readings for some base attributes.

Example:

"sunny[0.5];rainy[0.3];overcast[0.2],hot[1];cool[0.0];mild[0.0]"

Instance that stores values with their probabilities for two base attributes "outlook {sunny, overcast, rainy}" and "temperature {hot, mild, cool}".

{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Instance[source]

Instance(readings:List[Reading]=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}
